caption: Table 1 Distribution of Sex by Age among 13,881 patients
notes: Two-level header: 'Sexᵃ' spans 'Female, n (%)' and 'Male, n (%)' sub-columns. Lowest-level headers used.
footnotes: Footnote a (on Sex): Percent in row might not sum to 100 due to rounding. Chi-square tests compare sex distribution by age category, and overall. Mean ages compared by Wilcoxon test. Footnote b (on Total): Percent of all patients (n = 13,881).
